titleStmt.title: ¶ I will name the rare or new plants of your collection soon, dear Mr Holtze. I should like to have ripe fruiting specimens of the Utriculariae, and also some seed of each species in a paper envelope...

head.supplied: ¶ I will name the rare or new plants of your collection soon, dear Mr Holtze. I should like to have ripe fruiting specimens of the Utriculariae, and also some seed of each species in a paper envelope...

div.p: GRG 19/391, State Records of South Australia, Adelaide.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: This fragment has been dated to 1885 by comparing collection numbers with the specimens recorded in MEL in AVH (viewed 24 November 2019) and by reference to the October 1885 date of publication of the two species. There are two specimens for each of numbers 508 and 477, corresponding to the names given here, but in each case one collection is from 1885 and the other 1886. There are four specimens of Utricularia leptoplectra with number 243, all undated; the other dated 1895 is the unrelated Zornia prostrata. In B85.10.02, both U. leptoplectra and U. lasiccaulis are described without fruit being seen, and M's labels on the specimen sheets MEL1513935 and MEL 1513149 respectively give the date '1885' and the specimen numbers listed here.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: The translation is included within the text in square brackets.

p.seg: 508 two specimens, Utricularia leptoplectra, one 1885, one 1886

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
p.seg: 243 5 specimens, 4 Utricularia leptoplectra, all undated; one Zornia

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
p.seg: 477 2 specimens, Utricularia lasiocaulis, one april 1880, other 1885

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
p.seg: Do MEL 0090071 and/or MEL 0090112 include fruits? Sent in response to M's request?

div.p: Ich werde die seltnen oder neuen Pflanzen Ihrer Sammlung bald benennen, lieber Herr Holtze; von Utricularien hätte ich gern reife Frucht-Exemplare u. auch etwas Samen von jeder Art in Papier.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I will name the rare or new plants of your collection soon, dear Mr Holtze. I should like to have ripe fruiting specimens of the Utriculariae, and also some seed of each species in a paper envelope.
